header.title: User Guide

sidebar.community_text: Join our community for tips and support.

main.welcome_text: This guide will help you get up and running in just a few minutes. Our app combines powerful task management with focus tools to help you achieve your goals.

1.title: Create your account
1.description: Sign up for free and set up your profile. Choose your timezone and preferred language.

2.title: Create a Workspace
2.description: Workspaces help you separate different areas of your life. Create one for Personal and one for Work.

3.title: Add your first Project
3.description: Projects organize related tasks. Create a project for each major goal or initiative.

4.title: Create Tasks
4.description: Break down your projects into actionable tasks. Add due dates, priorities, and estimated time.

5.title: Start the Focus Timer
5.description: Select a task and start the Pomodoro timer. Stay focused for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break.

main.pro_tip_end: to quickly create new tasks from anywhere in the app!
main.explore_text: Dive deeper into specific features with these detailed guides:

projects.title: Projects & Boards
projects.description: Learn how to organize work with Kanban boards

GuideFocus.title: Focus Timer & Pomodoro
GuideFocus.subtitle: Stay in the flow with our built-in Pomodoro timer.
GuideFocus.pomodoro_text: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that breaks work into focused intervals (traditionally 25 minutes) separated by short breaks. It's proven to improve focus and prevent burnout.

focus.title: Focus Session
focus.description: Deep work on a single task. No distractions allowed.

short.title: Short Break
short.description: Quick rest to recharge. Stretch, hydrate, relax.

long.title: Long Break
long.description: Extended rest after 4 focus sessions. Go for a walk!

steps.1: Select a task from your list
steps.2: Click "Start Focus" to begin the timer

GuideFocus.pro_tip_text: Enable "Focus Mode" in settings to hide all notifications and distractions during your focus sessions. Your productivity will thank you!

GuideProjects.title: Projects & Kanban Boards
GuideProjects.subtitle: Organize your work visually with flexible boards and lists.
GuideProjects.managing_text: Projects in Ordo Todo allow you to group related tasks together. Whether you're launching a product, planning a vacation, or managing a team, Projects keep everything organized in one place.

creating_steps.1: Click the + New Project button in the sidebar
creating_steps.2: Give your project a descriptive name
creating_steps.3: Choose a color for easy identification
creating_steps.4: Select a workflow template (or start blank)

GuideProjects.views_text: Switch between different views to match your workflow:

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: Visualize your workflow with columns. Drag and drop cards to update status instantly.

list.title: List View
list.description: A structured, dense list perfect for reviewing many tasks at once. Great for sorting and filtering.

tags.title: Tags & Labels
tags.description: Categorize tasks with colored tags like "Design", "Marketing", or "Backend".

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Invite team members and assign tasks. Everyone stays in sync.

GuideProjects.pro_tip_end: to quickly toggle between Kanban and List views!

GuideTasks.title: Task Management
GuideTasks.subtitle: Master your daily to-do list with powerful task features.
GuideTasks.basics_text: Tasks are the fundamental building blocks of Ordo Todo. Each task can be as simple as "Buy groceries" or as complex as "Design new website homepage" with subtasks, attachments, and comments.
GuideTasks.quick_add_end: anywhere to create a new task
GuideTasks.or_click: Or click the "+" button in any project to add a task directly to that project.
GuideTasks.features_text: Click on any task to open the detail panel and access these powerful features:

subtasks.title: Subtasks
subtasks.description: Break complex tasks into smaller, manageable steps

due_dates.title: Due Dates
due_dates.description: Set deadlines and get timely reminders

priorities.title: Priorities
priorities.description: Mark tasks as Low, Medium, High, or Urgent

time.title: Time Estimates
time.description: Plan your day by estimating task duration

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Add files, links, and references to tasks

GuideTasks.statuses_text: Tasks move through these statuses as you work on them:
GuideTasks.priority_text: Use priorities to focus on what matters most:
GuideTasks.pro_tip_text: Use the Eisenhower Matrix view to automatically sort tasks by urgency and importance. Find it in the View menu!

GuideAnalytics.metrics_text: Track these essential metrics to understand and improve your productivity:

focus.title: Focus Hours
focus.description: Total time spent in focus sessions

GuideAnalytics.reports_text: Generate detailed reports to review your progress:

weekly.title: Weekly Report
weekly.description: Trends and patterns over the week

understanding.peak: Peak Hours: Find when you're most productive during the day
understanding.velocity: Task Velocity: Track how fast you complete tasks over time
understanding.ratio: Focus Ratio: Compare focus time vs total work time
understanding.goals: Goal Progress: See how close you are to weekly goals

GuideAnalytics.pro_tip_text: Review your analytics every Sunday evening. Use the insights to plan a more productive week ahead!
